column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////He went with the Tokyo Tonkotsu ramen
column2: while I ordered the JINYA Tonkotsu Black. We were tempted to go with one of the chicken broths
column3: but for his first time eating ramen
column4: it felt like it needed to be pork broth. We ended up sampling each others and both like mine more
column5: but he was quite happy with his. I hope this is the start of him becoming a ramen fanatic
column6: but you never forget your first!
